nodes.text: Ashsap trees were a type of tree. During the rebellion on the Outer Rim planet Akiva in 4 ABY, the Zabrak bounty hunter Jas Emari smashed the head of the Ithorian bouncer Herf into a door frame at the Alcazar cantina. Emari watched him topple, and thought it appeared similar to the felling of an ashsap tree.
Ashsap trees were first mentioned in Aftermath, a 2015 novel written by Chuck Wendig.
